output:
What child is this who lay to rest On Mary's lap is sleeping?
Warm angels greet with anthems sweet While shepherds watch are keeping.
This, this is Christ the King Warm shepherds guard and angels sing
His taste to bring him laud The babe, the son of Mary
Why lies he in such mean estate Where rocks and ants are feeding?
Would Christian fear for sinners hear The silent word is pleading?
This, this is Christ the King Warm shepherds guard and angels sing
His taste to bring him laud The babe, the son of Mary
So bring him incense, gold and myrrh Confess and king to own him
The King of kings salvation brings Let loving arms enthrone him
This, this is Christ the King Warm shepherds guard and angels sing
His taste to bring him laud The babe, the son of Mary
This, this is Christ the King Warm shepherds guard and angels sing
His taste to bring him laud The babe, the son of Mary
